name: Deco Online
summary: Deco Online was a free-to-play 3D MMORPG that put players deep into the fantastic story of two warring nations, Millena and Rain. As a legendary swordsman, a fierce archer, or a master of wizardry, players were constantly challenged by the opposing nation and by monsters that lurked around every corner. Notable features included a combo system with hundreds of potential skills, and guardian pets that buffed entire guilds.
